## MEDIA ##
## AxlRose - [Tsunamods] Cinema-RF FMV (30fps) ##
9b839870-3bec-4f2c-9102-d575b6090505 [Tsunamods] Cinema-RF FMV (30fps) AxlRose Media
- Cinema-RF (Cinema Refine) - AI Upscale and enhancement of all the FMVs + 30fps - 2X upscale from the original PC2000 release (and 4X from the PSX version), using both sources and nothing from the horrible Steam release videos - Using the higher quality soundtracks from the PSX version - These FMVs are as close as possible to vanilla - Interpolated at 30fps with lots of manual tweaks to get the best experience of the original game design.

## [Tsunamods] OST-RF - Arranged Soundtrack ##
c524b51b-64fd-49f3-bba2-eb94430c0c1d [Tsunamods] OST-RF - Arranged Soundtrack MikeDoesAudio, Final Fantasy & Chill Media
